etri.sdn.controller.protocol.io

Interface IOFHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFController

    public interface IOFHandler
    This is an interface that every controller instance should implement.
    Author:
    bjlee

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IOFHandler.Role
      The role of the controller as used by the OF 1.2 and OVS failover and load-balancing mechanism.
